name: prepify
description: A career-focused platform featuring an AI-powered resume analyzer, job application tracking, and mock interviews with AI.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=backend" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend" "npm run dev --workspace=electron"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=electron
scripts.build:prod: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run export --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=electron
scripts.dist: npm run build:prod && npm run dist --workspace=electron
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:prod && npm run dist:win --workspace=electron
scripts.pack: npm run build:prod && npm run pack --workspace=electron
scripts.test:build: npm run build:prod && echo 'Build completed successfully!'
